Articles.Content: Hi! I\'m a new member of the Forum and I LOVE Kerbal Space Program. I have been playing for over a month, and have mastered orbiting. However, The moons of Kerbin still remain as an unconquered challenge for me. I have been also attempting to put a ExIP space station into orbit w/ Nova Punch parts, and have been unsuccessful over 16 times > My main orbital vehicle is the Humana III (Yes, I use Roman Numerals), which is named after the mystical constellation of Humana ;P , and is so perfect at orbiting, It\'s kinda boring. I have taken pictures of the polar caps with this vehicle. I will post media some other time, so cya then! Oh yeah, even though my full name is Bioman222, You can call me Bio

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Welcome! PM me if you need help
Welcome on board! I\'m the opposite to you; I\'ve been to both moons a fair number of times but have yet to build a space station or successfully rendevous with anything in orbit.

I found out what shhilent\'s signature means. it transtlates to:

This is the most secret code txt can you read

this epe lol
